segments.text: I hate carrying so much cash with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you have a credit card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have one but it can only be used in my country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you change the cash to traveler's checks ? It's much more convenient and safer . When you are abroad , you can cash them .
segments.speaker: S2
